RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 30, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CON ON THE RUN sent clear moved alertly through the turn dispatching foe in upper stretch finishing with plenty left. OLA QUE TAL slow early gained while saving ground to upper stretch securing place near the rail. TEN TWENTY NINE away slowly lost ground to upper stretch moving up late near mid track. QIAN B C hustled along raced four wide on the turn then five wide down the lane finishing evenly. SHIELD OF FAITH threatened on the turn then wore out inside the eighth pole. OUT FOR JUSTICE flashed speed then faded on the turn. OLD MOUNTAIN LANE folded up early.

ENTRY.NAME: Old Mountain Lane
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up early

ENTRY.NAME: Out for Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Ten Twenty Nine
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, lost ground to lane, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Shield of Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: threatened turn, wore out

ENTRY.NAME: Ola Que Tal
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, gained inside to lane, secured place

ENTRY.NAME: Con On the Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, alert pace, plenty left

ENTRY.NAME: Qian B C
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, 4 wide turn, 5 wide lane, even finish

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS NUCKOLS broke sharply taking then maintaining clear lead throughout holding others well safe. PAYNT THE KITTY chased a loose leader to upper stretch vying in the three path there responding late to save place. MARIMBA hustled along pursued from the inside to upper stretch weakening late. THATS ALL SHEWROTE chased early dropping off on the turn racing evenly in the four path down the lane. MY BRIDGET VERDOT played no factor. SPEEDY FIRE faded on the turn. MADS HOPE was never involved. VERMONT HOLIDAY gave way wide on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Nuckols
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, maintained lead, held firm to wire

ENTRY.NAME: My Bridget Verdot
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Mads Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Thats All Shewrote
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, dropped off on turn, finished evenly 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Marimba
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pursued inside to lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt the Kitty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, three path lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Vermont Holiday
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In El igibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AYY LADIES tracked the pace rallying to collar rival at the quarter pole extended abreast rival to lead in upper stretch edging clear late. NELL'S BELLS slow early gained outside on the far turn moving evenly four wide down the lane finding best stride the last seventy yards. SHE AINT NO JOKE hustled out set the pace to the far turn being hooked near the quarter pole fighting back on the inside coming up a bit short. IRON WILMA moved on pace extending through the far turn weakening in upper stretch. GRAND VENUS faded on the backside. ON STRIKE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: On Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Ayy Ladies
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, hooked foe 1/4 pole, edged clear lane

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Venus
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on backside

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Wilma
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved on pace, extended far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: She Aint No Joke
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, set pace, hooked 1/4 pole, wore down late

ENTRY.NAME: Nell's Bells
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, gained outside far turn, 4 wide lane, best came late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 8700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAUL DRAKE set a pressured pace digging in along the inside in upper stretch finding more to win clear. PERFECT SPLIT pressured the pace racing abreast rival to upper stretch being turned away late while holding well as second best. SOUTHERN SENSE a step slow through the turn gave a mild rally along the inside in upper stretch finishing evenly. HOLLYWOOD PRINCE gave hard pursuit through the turn weakening inside the final eighth. HICKORY BILL was never involved. BUSTER BURNS off slowly was outrun. BLACK BULL raced second flight fading in upper stretch. TRUST FUND ROBBER was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Sense
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally inside lane, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Hollywood Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Trust Fund Robber
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Paul Drake
ENTRY.COMMENT: set a pressured pace, dug in to lane, found more inside

ENTRY.NAME: Hickory Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Black Bull
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Buster Burns
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Split
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, extended abreast lane, turned away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022-2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 30 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GO STELLAIRE a step slow early circled out on the turn vying seven then six wide down the lane sweeping clear in the final yards. LILAC LACE pressed up on the turn dueling abreast rival down the lane ceding late to wide pressure. ORBIT MARS away alertly pressed the pace cling to a narrow lead through the turn then down the lane ceding grudgingly late on the inside. SWEET BELEN chased the pace coming five wide in upper stretch angling out to six path late staying on the end. VINTAGE SPARKLE slow early gained some while seven wide in upper stretch angling in mid stretch losing momentum. AMAAZA pressured hard through the turn wearing down the final eighth. MARIPOSA D'ORO chased from mid pack through the turn tiring in upper stretch. LADY VALENTINA flashed early speed then faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Go Stellaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, circled out turn, bid 7-6 wide, swept clear

ENTRY.NAME: Mariposa d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased mid pack, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Vintage Sparkle
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 7 wide upper stretch, angled in

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Belen
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 5 wide lane, angled 6 wide, stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Amaaza
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wore down lane

ENTRY.NAME: Orbit Mars
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed pace, dueled on inside lane, gave all

ENTRY.NAME: Lilac Lace
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on turn, dueled abreast lane, overpowered late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPEAK YOUR MIND sent clear moved alertly widening on the turn holding firm to wire under stiff handling. ACCOLADES GALORE hesitated breaking late, fired at the quarter pole surging on the inside in upper stretch angling out in mid stretch getting up three deep for place. COASTAL RUN chased the pace to upper stretch extending four wide hanging late. SHOW ME THE BEST raced evenly inside to upper stretch battling for minors late. SEMIRAMIS was always outrun. FLAT OUT APPEALING raced a step slow to upper stretch tiring there.

ENTRY.NAME: Semiramis
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Show Me the Best
ENTRY.OWNER: Young Thomas J and Acevedo Israel
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly inside, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Speak Your Mind
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, alert on lead, held firm driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Accolades Galore
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated off late, rallied inside top lane, angled out, surged

ENTRY.NAME: Coastal Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4 wide lane, hung

ENTRY.NAME: Flat Out Appealing
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, tired lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Purse 28600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 30 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, Or Starter Races Not Considered) (Preference to Highest Earnings in 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHIEF RANDEL pressed the pace dueling abreast rival through the turn into upper stretch extending to a late lead holding up under outside pressure. WILLISTON WAY slow early circled out to upper stretch rallying late five then six wide to be right there at the end. PRIMAL DESTINY sent hard dueled n a narrow lead along the inside through the turn then down the stretch ceding grudgingly late. STORM BOARDER (CHI) was checked between horses shortly after the break then again near the seven sixteenths pole regrouping to loom outside foes in upper stretch angling out late needing a bit more at the end. FREE DANCER raced evenly through the turn bidding mildly four wide down the lane. EMPEROROFTHEDARK checked back when in close near the seven sixteenths pole. JAZZ HANDS off slowly was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Williston Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, circled to lane, rallied gamely 5-6 wide

ENTRY.NAME: Emperorofthedark
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked back 7/16 pole

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Boarder (CHI)
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked between early then again 7/16, pressed lane, angled out

ENTRY.NAME: Free Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, mild bid 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Jazz Hands
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Randel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast lane, clear late, held up

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Harry D. Waite & Ronald C. Waite

ENTRY.NAME: Primal Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, dueled on narrow lead, battled inside lane, gave all

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 30 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MS. P'S BELLA chased the pace dueling in upper stretch edging clear late. SWEET VALERIA hustled along loomed in upper stretch vying gamely to the wire. PREMIER WISH chased the pace extending into upper stretch looming to the wire. LITTLE MISS CAT raced evenly losing ground to upper stretch gaining late seven wide. RED ROCKET GIRL away alertly set the pace dueling along the inside in upper stretch weakening late. COACH MACHEN raced evenly in mid pack lacking a closing move. AWESOME WONDER slow early gave an even finish inside. MY PINK BABY BIRD chased early fading in upper stretch. MILLIE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, even finish inside

ENTRY.NAME: Coach Machen
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly mid pack, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: My Pink Baby Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Premier Wish
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended into lane, loomed to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Millie
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Little Miss Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lost ground to lane, gained late 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Red Rocket Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, hooked inside lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. P's Bella
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, dueled upper stretch, edged clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Liz Roach & Northern Dawn Stables Inc

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Valeria
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, loomed upper stretch, vied gamely to wire
